System Modules Guide

The System Modules section controls the main menus of Unit Master and how users navigate through the system.

What is the System Modules section?

The System Modules area is where system administrators configure the main modules or menus that appear in Unit Master. From here you control the top level structure of the application.

System Modules overview

The System Modules section contains the main menus of Unit Master. Here administrators can see a list of all modules and manage them.

From this page administrators can:

  • Add a new module name.
  • Edit an existing module.
  • Delete modules that are no longer needed.

This allows you to control the overall structure of the system and which functional areas are available to users.

Add new module

To add a new module, use the New Module form:

Fill in the following fields:

  • Module Name Enter the full name of the menu item.
  • Short Name Enter the short version used where space is limited.
  • Module URL Enter the link or route that opens when the menu is clicked.
  • Module ICON Enter the icon class (for example fa fa-users).

Then press Save:

This will add a new module to the page and the menu will appear in the sidebar for users who have the correct role.
